q: Trade unions and politicians have already accused Sergio Marchionne of "blackmail" in pushing through a tough deal on working conditions at Fiat's flagship Mirafiori plant in Turin to save the factory from closure. Fiat is a great multinational which is growing in the world but its heart remains Italian, Industry Minister Paolo Romani said Saturday, adding, "All arguments are now closed. Romanni had said Monday that he would be asking Sergio Marchionne "to commit to investing in our country and remain with head and heart" in Italy. Mayor of Turin Sergio Chiamparino said Saturday the Fiat

( 03.02.11) that she and partner DJ news from Female First"> DJ Darren Emerson split some time ago, but have remained close in order to protect their two-year-old son Ben. She said: As you ladies are aware I separated from Darren Emerson some time ago and we have worked through this together. We have come to terms with it now and are now able to speak about it. Every relationship where a child is involved is born out of love. There is a little boy in the middle and he has to come first. There is an overwhelming emotion of sadness but it doesn't make me want to scream and shout. It makes me want to learn from it. " I wouldn't watch the show now because it would be like seeing your ex-boyfriend with his new girlfriend. " Kate Thornton and Darren Emerson started dating in 2004 and got engaged in 2007. Unter dem erfahrenen Manager hat sich Google von einer aufstrebenden Suchmaschine zu einem breit aufgestellten Technologiekonzern gemausert. Eric Schmidt ist ein toller Firmenchef und ich habe viel von ihm gelernt , sagtLarry Page in einer Telefonkonferenz.
